body_html: I think we should eventually add a is_mutable flag to ListType and DynamicType. That would help distinguish mutable for simple cases. A mutability inference pass can run after the compiler but before inserting fencing that would performance this inference. That way the fencing pass will easily know when to add fences and when not to. This doesn't have to be in this PR.

body: I think we should eventually add a `is_mutable` flag to ListType and DynamicType. That would help distinguish mutable for simple cases.  A mutability inference pass can run after the compiler but before  inserting fencing that would performance this inference. That way the fencing pass will easily know when to add fences and when not to. This doesn't have to be in this PR.
